short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Take control of your X timeline.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Define a prompt, and use your xAI API key to power it. All your timeline content will be filtered according to your prompt. You no longer have to endure unwanted tweets whether it is politics, course sellers, clickbait drama. Simply define your prompt and filter out what you donâ€™t want to see

No more incognito sessions to avoid corrupting your algorithm. Your extension acts as your silent guardian, fighting unwanted content.

Your data is yours. API keys and prompts are stored locally and only used for filtering tweets via the xAI API.
